author: Special Correspondent
text:
A large number of men, women and children were screened for various medical disorders at the free medical camp organised by the Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital on the Government Higher Secondary School premises in Edapadi on Sunday.

The medical camp was organised in connection with the birthday celebrations of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

Edappdi K. Palanisamy, Minister for State Highways and Minor Ports, inaugurated the camp in the presence of V. Sampath, Collector and V. Panneerselvam, MP and P. Kanagaraj, Dean, Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital. Mr. Palanisamy said that the Chief Minister’s Extended Health Insurance Scheme had benefitted a total of 66,934 people in the district.
title: Medical camp held
